who-we-are-intro: The .NET Core Community (NCC) is a free kingdom composed of .NET technology enthusiasts who embrace diversity. They will ignite the future of .NET with love and dreams.
id-of-ncc-and-member-projects: Identity of TheNCC and Member Projects
live-broadcast-intro: The NCC 2F is a technical topic sharing column launched, adopts the way of live streaming + recording. It periodically conducts online technical sharing sessions through live broadcasts.
